status:
<box type='linear' class='status-box'>
			<image id='tradeStatusLogo' class='status-logo'/>
			<text id='tradeStatus' class='status-text'/>
			<image id='rightArrow' class='right-arrow'/>
		</box>
title:
<box id='valueLayout' class='amount-box-layout' type='linear' >
			<text id='nameText' class='subtitle-name'/>
			<box id='valueLayout' class='title-box' type='linear' >
				<image id='titleIcon' class='title-icon'/>
				<text id='titleText' class='title-text'/>
			</box>
			<view class='full-line-seperator'/>
		</box>
singleValueLine:
<box class='line-box' type='linear'>
			<text id='nameText' class='line-left-text'/>
			<box id='valueLayout' class='line-value-box' type='linear'>
				<text id='valueText' class='line-right-text'/>
				<text id='currencyText' class='line-right-text-extra'/>
			</box>
			<image id='rightArrow' class='right-arrow'/>
		</box>
lastValueLine:
<box class='last-line-box' type='linear'>
			<text id='nameText' class='line-left-text'/>
			<box id='valueLayout' class='line-value-box' type='linear'>
				<text id='valueText' class='line-right-text'/>
				<text id='currencyText' class='line-right-text-extra'/>
			</box>
			<image id='rightArrow' class='right-arrow'/>
		</box>
multiValueLine:
<box class='amount-box-layout' type='linear'>
			<text id='nameText' class='line-left-text' text='$name'/>
			<box id='valueLayout' class='line-value-box' type='linear'>
				<foreach iter='i' in='$values'>
					<text id='valueText' text='$i' class='shipinfo-text'/>
				</foreach>
			</box>
			<view class='full-line-seperator'/>
		</box>
amountValueLine:
<box id='valueLayout' class='amount-box-layout' type='linear' >
			<text id='nameText' class='subtitle-name'/>
			<box id='valueLayout' class='amount-value-box' type='linear' >
				<text id='integerValueText' class='integer-amount-value'/>
				<text id='decimalValueText' class='decimal-amount-value'/>
			</box>
			<text id='feeText' class='amount-fee'/>
			<view class='full-line-seperator'/>
		</box>
oppositeInfoLine:
<box id='valueLayout' class='opposite-line-box' type='linear' >
			<roundAngleImage id='oppositeHeadImg' class='opposite-head-img'/>
			<text id='opositeName' class='opposite-name-value'/>
		</box>
rechargeNo:
<box id='valueLayout' class='amount-box-layout' type='linear' >
			<text id='nameText' class='subtitle-name'/>
			<text id='valueText' class='rechargeNo-value'/>
			<view class='full-line-seperator'/>
		</box>
shipInfo:
<box id='shipInfoLayout' class='shipinfo-box-layout' type='linear' >
			<box type='linear' class='shipinfo-box'>
				<box type='linear' class='shipinfo-vertical-box'>
					<text id='nameText' class='shipinfo-name'/>
					<text id='shipinfoText' class='shipinfo-text' text='$value'/>
				</box>
				<image id='rightArrow' class='right-arrow'/>
			</box>
			<view class='full-line-seperator'/>
		</box>
voiceMemoInfo:
<box id='valueLayout' class='amount-box-layout' type='linear' >
			<text id='nameText' class='subtitle-name'/>
			<box type='linear' class='voiceinfo-box'>
				<button class='voice-button-box' id='voiceButton'/>
			</box>
			<view class='full-line-seperator'/>
		</box>
textMemoInfo:
<box id='valueLayout' class='amount-box-layout' type='linear' >
			<text id='nameText' class='subtitle-name'/>
			<text id='valueText' class='text-memo-value'/>
			<view class='full-line-seperator'/>
		</box>
refundDetail:
<box id='refundDetailLayout' type='linear' class='refund-box-layout'>
			<box class='refund-line-box' type='linear'>
				<text id='nameText' class='line-left-text'/>
			</box>
			<box id='reasonBox' class='refund-line-box' type='linear'>
				<text id='reasonName' text='退款原因' class='line-left-text'/>
				<text id='reasonValue' text='$reasonValue' class='line-right-text'/>
			</box>
			<box id='typeBox' class='refund-line-box' type='linear'>
				<text id='typeName' text='退款方式' class='line-left-text'/>
				<text id='typeValue' text='$typeValue' class='line-right-text'/>
			</box>
			<box id='timeBox' class='refund-line-box' type='linear'>
				<text id='timeName' text='退款时间' class='line-left-text'/>
				<text id='timeValue' text='$timeValue' class='line-right-text'/>
			</box>
			<view class='refund-full-line-seperator'/>
		</box>
